settings.title: Create your own personalized chocolate assortment
settings.step_1: Step 1 - Select your chocolate gift box

settings.custom_liquid:
{%- if product.available -%}
In Stock
{%- else -%}
Out of Stock
{%- endif -%}

settings.accelerated_message: Add a Gift Message or Specific Delivery Date on the Cart Page.

settings.alcohol_restrictions_notice: Some of these chocolates contain alcohol, restrictions apply. Please confirm that you are 21+ years old and the delivery is to AR, AZ, CA, CO, DE, FL, HI, IL, IA, KY, LA, MD, MN, MO, NC, NE, NH, NV, NJ, NY, OR, TX, VA, WA, or WV.

settings.custom_liquid:
<script type="text/javascript">
console.log("klaviyo script working");
  var _learnq = _learnq || [];
  var item = {
    Name: {{ product.title|json }},
    ProductID: {{ product.id|json }},
    Categories: {{ product.collections|map:'title'|json }},
    ImageURL: "https:{{ product.featured_image.src|img_url:'grande' }}",
    URL: "{{ shop.secure_url }}{{ product.url }}",
    Brand: {{ product.vendor|json }},
    Price: {{ product.price|money|json }},
    CompareAtPrice: {{ product.compare_at_price_max|money|json }}
  };
  _learnq.push(['track', 'Viewed Product', item]);
  _learnq.push(['trackViewedItem', {
    Title: item.Name,
    ItemId: item.ProductID,
    Categories: item.Categories,
    ImageUrl: item.ImageURL,
    Url: item.URL,
    Metadata: {
      Brand: item.Brand,
      Price: item.Price,
      CompareAtPrice: item.CompareAtPrice
    }
  }]);


    const selector_button = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName('chocolateAddButton'));
    let selected_items = [];
    selector_button.forEach(item => { 
        item.addEventListener('click', function handleClick(event){ 
            let title = $(this).attr('title');
            let image = $(this).attr('image');
            selected_items.push({'item_name': title, 'Image': image});
            console.log(title,"image ==-=-=-" + image)
            _learnq.push(["track", "selected_items", {
                 "selected_items": JSON.stringify(selected_items) 
                 }
                ]); 
            });
        });


</script>
